name: Pong (itch) (UchiMama)
description:
NOTE: Please play in Full Screen mode.

Controls

Left paddle:  w = up, s = down

Right paddle: up = up, down = down

----------

A remake of the classic Atari table-tennis game from 1972.  

Written in C# with Unity, using sfx from this audio asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256#d...
